nodes.text: A male Otolla Gungan observer lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. From the planet Naboo, the Gungan served the Republic as an observer during a battle on the planet Drongar in 20 BBY. However, the Gungan was hit in the mouth by a sonic blaster shot from a Separatist soldier; the injury left his buccal cavity severely varicosed. The Gungan was brought to the Republic Mobile Surgical Unit 7, where he was operated on by the Duros surgeon Leemoth.
The Gungan had a brief appearance in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel of the MedStar Duology. Battle Surgeons was written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry and published in 2004.
